contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 12, 1978 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 1 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-championship-sec
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including Simoraine. 7 bands competed.
1st Prize: £150.00 (Mk Championship trophy) 2nd Prize: £75.00 (Sterling Grade trophy) 3rd Prize: £25.00
March 7, 2011, 1:03 p.m. March 7, 2011, 1:04 p.m.
1 Newhall Band Ernest Woodhouse
2 Towcester Studio Band William Scholes
3 Hyundai Heart of England Roy Curran
Unknown Result Stalybridge Old Band Gordon Saunders

Unknown Result City of Coventry Brass Band Leonard Pepper
